mapper.insert: insert into message( receiver_id, sender_id, message_content, is_checked, status, created_at, updated_at) values (#{receiverId}, #{senderId}, #{messageContent}, 'N', #{status}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.select: select count(receiver_id) as counts from message where receiver_id = #{userIdx} and is_checked = 'N'
select receiver_id as num from message where sender_id = #{userId} union select sender_id as num from message where receiver_id = #{userId}

select sender_id as senderId, receiver_id as receiverId, created_at as createdAt, is_checked as isChecked, message_content as messageContent, message_id as messageId from message where sender_id = #{senderId} and receiver_id = #{receiverId} order by created_at desc
